steps.name: New User Setup
Free User Sign up
Create new user data
Free user sign up API call
Free User Email Confirmation via Database
Free User Login
Fill in "Email Address" input field.
Fill in "Password" input field.
Click on "Login" button.
Upgrade Free User to Business
Click on "Settings" item on the left SideMenu.
Click on "Billing" item in the Settings submenu.
Click on "Upgrade" button for Business option.
Enter card details
Fill in the "Card Number" input field
Fill in the "Expiration Date" input field
Fill in the "CVC" input field
Fill in the "Full Name On Card" input field
Fill in the "ZIP" input field
Click on "Subscribe" button.
Click on "No,thanks" button.
Wait for toast message with the text "Plan has been successfully changed." to be hidden
Click on "Sign" item on the left SideMenu.
Precondition: Add team member with "User" role set
Click on "Team" item on the left SideMenu.
Click on "Add Team Member" button
Fill in team member's 'Email' input field.
Fill in team member's 'Name' input field.
Get team member's role value.
Click on "Send Invites" button.
Retrieve the confirmation link from the user's email.
Navigate to the invite link
Click on "Back to main page" button.
Wait for toast message with the text "Invite accepted." to be hidden
Click on "Team" item on the left SideMenu.
Verify team member has role 'User' set in Team table
